text:
Hello guys,
I have an application that creates a task for a specific salesperson when no one is online. When this task is created, I need to send a notification to that specific person. Through the API, I can only send a reminder when the task is expired.
I tried creating a workflow, but it is based on a contact, and in the workflow, I could only assign it to a fixed person. I would like to send it dynamically to the specific salesperson. How can I achieve this? Thanks!
Thank you for your reply! But yes, I’m aware of that and that’s not the problem. But thanks anyway!
Hey <@U04MZF2VA3H>, I’m having the same issue. This has not been solved yet, right?
